message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm confident this product will exceed the value you place on it.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,375,000.  This feels like a fair compromise that reflects its true worth.

I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, my budget constraints are quite tight. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000. I hope this proposal allows us to reach an agreement.
